posts.post_content:
Extremely rare and historic significant postcard of the 1913 Texas League Champion Houston Buffaloes...  

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/forsale/1913houstonbuffaloes/large/1913%20Houston%20pc.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/forsale/1913houstonbuffaloes/large/1913%20Houston%20reverse.jpg[/IMG]

*First minor league team affiliated with a major league team (St. Louis Cardinals) in baseball history
*Contains a ton of players who played in the majors:
[URL="http://www.baseball-reference.com:8080/register/team.cgi?id=db657e43"]roster[/URL]

Only other public sale I could find was Heritage for $956 back in 2013 (with an offer on the site of $1243)
[URL="https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball/extremely-rare-c-1913-houston-buffaloes-real-photo-post-card-sgc-40-vg-3/a/7085-80225.s?ic4=GalleryView-ShortDescription-071515"]link[/URL]

No longer available.

**Please also see my Babe Ruth & Joe Jackson REA lots [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=1712578#post1712578"]here[/URL]
